citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
A protocol identified during inspection contained potentially painful procedures for hamsters. The protocol did not contain
a consideration of alternatives to potentially painful procedures.
The IACUC must determine that the principal investigator has considered alternatives to procedures that may cause more
than momentary or slight pain or distress to the animals and has provided a written narrative description of the methods
and sources used.
Corrected at the time of inspection.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.31(d)(1)(ii) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
A protocol identified during inspection contained potentially painful procedures for hamsters. The protocol did not contain 
a consideration of alternatives to potentially painful procedures.  
The IACUC must determine that the principal investigator has considered alternatives to procedures that may cause more 
than momentary or slight pain or distress to the animals and has provided a written narrative description of the methods 
and sources used. 
Corrected at the time of inspection. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
